definition: (in a manual car) gear (i.e. reverse, neutral, 1st, 2nd etc)/(automatic car) transmission mode (P, R, N, D etc)/(electric fan etc) speed setting
to resist/to obstruct/to hinder/to keep off/to block (a blow)/to get in the way of/cover/gear (e.g. in a car's transmission)
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Using the appropriate gear will keep the engine run smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 使用合适的挡位，可以保持引擎平稳运行。

sentences.english: All of that reduces Beijing's capacity to move policy back into top gear.
sentences.chinese: 这一切都削弱了北京把政策换回最高挡位的能力。
解放油罐车挡位和优雅。

sentences.english: The utility model is especially suitable for an electric appliance working machine with a plurality of thresholds.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型特别适用于多挡位的电器工作机上。

sentences.english: Production and development of various models of gear jacket, Handbrake jacket, dust mats.
sentences.chinese: 定制开发各种车型挡位护套，手刹护套，防尘垫。

sentences.english: Once this happens, push in the clutch, and downshift to a lower gear.
sentences.chinese: 一旦速度下降，踏下离合器，切换到更低挡位。

definition: to put into gear/to engage the gear/gear change
(of a car) to slip out of gear/to pop out of gear
angular velocity/number of revolutions per minute
